ygData.subject: Question about Mistmoore
ygData.msgSnippet: My main question about Mistmoore deals with faction. I have heard and this has been confirmed by friends that when you kill MOBs in Mistmoore you lose faction
ygData.messageBody:
My main question about Mistmoore deals with faction.

I have heard and this has been confirmed by friends that when you kill MOBs
in Mistmoore you lose faction with the same Queen that I gain faction with
when I complete the Teir'Dal Necro Quests.

This would seem to indicate that fighting in Mistmoore would be a BAD thing
for a Tier'Dal Necromancer to do; however, I see some of the pet component
quests require items from Mistmoore.

So should I fight in Mistmoore? Some of my friends want me to go there but
so far I have declined because of this faction loss. This is for both
role-playing reasons (I want to be a loyal subject of my Queen) and I also
don't want to screw up my faction for quests that Verant may implement in
the future.

Anyway, any information is appreciated.


Azerin D'Tsalaroth of Brell
